General.Name: Dana Brata Luhur PT
General.Description: PT Dana Brata Luhur Tbk provides port and coal facility services in Indonesia. It operates through four segments: Management Fee, Heavy Machinery Rental, Mining, and Port Management Services. The company engages in the provision of port services, such as hauling roads and coal ports, and jetty and conveyor. It also provides mining support facilities; supply and services of ships, passengers, and goods, as well as operates a coal terminal on the banks of the Barito River. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
